about_the_game:
A unique artbook from the game The Princess of the Tower Wants a Hero
Get the best Artworks & behind the scenes (including backgrounds and special scenes) about our awesome Jester in Full HD Resolution, full source quality and without any logos or watermarks.

Note: On Steam the art collection will be downloaded as DLC and will be contained within the same directory as your core game files.
detailed_description:
A unique artbook from the game The Princess of the Tower Wants a Hero
Get the best Artworks & behind the scenes (including backgrounds and special scenes) about our awesome Jester in Full HD Resolution, full source quality and without any logos or watermarks.

Note: On Steam the art collection will be downloaded as DLC and will be contained within the same directory as your core game files.
